name: Automate Product Launch Sequence with Notion, Mailchimp, Buffer, Google Calendar & Telegram
description:
## Automate Product Launch Sequence with Notion, Mailchimp, Buffer, Google Calendar & Telegram üöÄ  
### *Launch your digital products, courses, or content with confidence ‚Äî using a fully automated sequence that handles email, social media, internal tracking, and team alerts.*

No more missed steps. No last-minute panic. Just smooth, professional launches ‚Äî on autopilot.

This workflow is perfect for:
- üßë‚Äçüè´ Creators launching a course or eBook
- üíº Solopreneurs introducing a new offer
- üì£ Marketers running a 5-day launch
- üë©‚Äçüëß Homemakers sharing a printables bundle

It automatically:
1. üìÖ Pulls launch content from your **Notion database**
2. üíå Sends email campaigns via **Mailchimp**
3. üì± Schedules social posts using **Buffer**
4. üìÜ Logs events in **Google Calendar**
5. üì¢ Sends internal alerts via **Telegram**

---

## Setup Instructions

### 1. Notion Database Requirements
Your Notion database must have the following **columns**:

| Property | Type | Example |
|--------|------|--------|
| `Name` | Title | "Day 1: Welcome Email" |
| `Content Type` | Select | `Email`, `Social Post`, `Webinar` |
| `Platform` | Multi-select | `Mailchimp`, `Buffer`, `Telegram` |
| `Scheduled Date` | Date | 2025-09-05 9:00 AM |
| `Email Subject` | Text | "You're In! Here‚Äôs Your Guide" |
| `Email Body` | Text | "Hi {{name}}, thanks for joining..." |
| `Social Message` | Text | "Our new planner is live! Grab it here ‚Üí" |
| `Status` | Status | `To Do`, `In Progress`, `Done` |

üìå **Tip**: Duplicate our [free Notion template](https://yourwebsite.com/notion-launch-template) to get started quickly.

---

## How to Install

1. Import the JSON into n8n.
2. Set up credentials:
   - Notion API
   - Mailchimp API
   - Buffer (OAuth)
   - Google Calendar
   - Telegram Bot
3. Connect to your Notion database.
4. Run the workflow ‚Äî it will process all items scheduled for today.

---

## Customization Guidance

- üîÑ **Change the schedule**: Replace the Trigger node with a Schedule node (e.g., daily at 8 AM).
- üìß **Add more email platforms**: Swap Mailchimp for ConvertKit or ActiveCampaign.
- üì≤ **Use WhatsApp instead of Telegram**: Replace Telegram with WhatsAble for team alerts.
- üéØ **Filter by tag or audience**: Add a Function node to route content based on `Content Type`.
- üåê **Add Instagram or LinkedIn**: Extend Buffer to post to more platforms.

This workflow grows with your launch strategy.

---

## Nodes Used

- `n8n-nodes-base.notion` ‚Äì Pull launch tasks
- `n8n-nodes-base.mailchimp` ‚Äì Send email campaigns
- `n8n-nodes-base.buffer` ‚Äì Schedule social media
- `n8n-nodes-base.googleCalendar` ‚Äì Log launch events
- `n8n-nodes-base.telegram` ‚Äì Send internal alerts

meta.description: Automated client nurture email system that sends personalized milestone emails at 7, 30, and 60 days based on Notion database tracking with Telegram notifications

workflow.name: Automate client nurture emails and testimonial collection from Notion

user.name: Shelly-Ann Davy

I craft elegant, task-focused automations for creators, founders, and soft-tech enthusiasts.

‚ÄúAutomate with grace. Scale with power.‚Äù

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
